title: God's Worn Out Servants
description: [SHORT STORY] God's Worn Out Servants is a short story written especially for busy moms. Is it possible to be too busy serving God to be of any use to Him? Terreldor Press is proud to introduce Tattie Maggard's first short story, which just may help you find your own answer to this question. ~10 pages.
author: Tattie Maggard
